cause.description:
most people are not christians...... some of them are ppl who have neva heard the word of God ...... some of them are just some ignorant people who dont even want to hear the word of God ..... so are job is to plant the seeds and God will water them
1. Jesus christ is our God and savior
2. God created the world
3. to witness to ppl all over the world
cause.mission: witness to ppl all over the world
cause.name: how to witness to against atheist
